title: RIZE - 💡︱tutorial
html:
Hey Rizers!

You spoke and we listened. We have decided to make the onboarding process even more smooth and seamless.

To ensure this, we have removed the friction of the discord verification from sign up process and have added a walkthrough guide to the platform. 

Here are are the steps to follow including some visuals!

**Step 1: Use a referral link and input a valid code**.

Welcome to RIZE.

_image attattached - your screen after a successful registration_

title: RIZE - 💡︱tutorial
html:
**Step 2: Go to the left panel of the dashboard and click on the "deposit button"**

ETH, USDT and USDC are currently supported, more tokens support coming soon...

_image attached - shows the location of the "deposit button"_

title: RIZE - 💡︱tutorial
html:
**Step 3: Build a super squad of persons who will deposit and progress through each target.**

Build a squad by sharing your invitation links to friends and family.

_image attached - shows the squad section of your dashboard_

title: RIZE - 💡︱tutorial
html:
**Step 4: Start progressing through the squad targets by having high cumulative deposits.**

Deposits made by you and your squad adds up to reach the squad target

Note: you earn 18% of your squad members points and 9% of their invitees(their squad members)

_image attached - shows your squad list_

title: RIZE - 💡︱tutorial
html:
**Step 5: Check in daily to play the card game for more points.**

To earn extra points;
- Participating in our discord bounties, see #🎯︱how-to-earn 
- Making creative contributions(ex: memes, GIFs, stickers, graphics, twitter threads and more) on twitter/discord
- Completing squad targets

Note:
- Leveling up gets you more invitation codes
- Funds will be available for withdrawal on August 31, 2024.
